attributes.action: Honour the many deserving unpaid voluntary workers rather that celebrities and highly paid business people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Honours system has fallen into disrepute as it does not recognise the contribution made to our society by the thousands of unpaid helpers in voluntary organisations. It is biased towards celebrity and wealth which in some cases is warranted but the extent to which it applies has totally devalued the system.
